definition: a breed of horse/variant of 歡|欢[huan1]
see 節骨眼|节骨眼[jie1 gu5 yan3]
festival/holiday/node/joint/section/segment/part/to economize/to save/to abridge/moral integrity/classifier for segments, e.g. lessons, train wagons, biblical verses/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: And what do those visiting Karneval dress up as? Everything imaginable.
sentences.chinese: 看看这些科隆狂欢节参与者的打扮，发挥你的想象吧。

sentences.english: Bret : These movies were indebted to the carnival and the freak show.
sentences.chinese: 此类电影应该算是得益于狂欢节及怪诞异常的表演。

sentences.english: Carnival of Carnivals will bring together examples of carnivals from interested towns.
sentences.chinese: 狂欢节的展品可以提供给其他感兴趣的城市模范作用。

sentences.english: New Orleans hosts the United States' most notorious Mardi Gras festivities.
sentences.chinese: 新奥尔良主办美国最臭名昭著的四旬斋前狂欢节。

sentences.english: There the Carnival forms part of politics.
sentences.chinese: 狂欢节是政治的一部分。

sentences.english: The image was taken during the Carnival in the town of Jacmel, Haiti.
sentences.chinese: 该图像是获得在狂欢节期间的雅克梅勒镇，海地。

sentences.english: The image was taken during the Carnival in the town of Jacmel, Haiti .
sentences.chinese: 这张照片是在海地雅克梅勒镇狂欢节期间拍摄的。

sentences.english: And one year, I went to New Orleans for Mardi Gras.
sentences.chinese: 有一年，我去新奥尔良参加狂欢节。

sentences.english: The carnival is the final big party before the penitential season of Lent begins.
sentences.chinese: 狂欢节是四旬斋之前的最后狂欢盛会。

sentences.english: Hallowtide had a little of the atmosphere of Carnival or Mardi Gras.
sentences.chinese: 万圣季的气氛有一点像嘉年华或忏悔星期二的狂欢节。

sentences.english: I got some good shots of the carnival.
sentences.chinese: 我有几个狂欢节的精彩镜头。

sentences.english: But it's not just German politicians who get the Karneval treatment.
sentences.chinese: 不光是德国政治家被卷进了科隆狂欢节。

sentences.english: Venice becomes even more enchanting during Carnival.
sentences.chinese: 狂欢节上的威尼斯尤其迷人。

sentences.english: Tessa and Bill are at the Winter Carnival in Quebec City.
sentences.chinese: 特萨和比尔正在魁北克市冬季狂欢节的现场。

sentences.english: The scaffold forms part of the fte.
sentences.chinese: 断头台是狂欢节必不可少的一部分。

sentences.english: A kind of carnival, a carnivale, a Mardi Gras, where a festival is going on.
sentences.chinese: 一种嘉年华，狂欢节，庆典举行的所在。

definition: see 光棍節|光棍节[Guang1 gun4 jie2]
see 光棍節|光棍节[Guang1 gun4 jie2]
